data.title: Anne-Hamilton LeRoy - Women's Basketball
data.meta_description: Anne-Hamilton  LeRoy (30) Guard  - Career: Steady scoring guard who has averaged double digits in her Longwood career at 10.9 points per game…Named to the Big South
data.text:
Career: Steady scoring guard who has averaged double digits in her Longwood career at 10.9 points per game…Named to the Big South All-Freshman Team in 2020, Second-Team All-Conference in 2023…Surpassed 1,000 total career points at Longwood and currently sits at 16th all-time (1,212)…Sits second in free throws made all time (337)…Knocked down 97 threes in her Longwood career…Has scored double digits 53 times…

2022-23 (Senior): Named to the Big South Second-Team All-Conference and Big South Preseason Second-Team All-Conference…Started all 30 games, led the Lancers with 995 minutes played…Averaged career-highs with 13.4 points, 3.8 rebounds, and 1.6 assists per game…Scored a career-high 30 points against USC Upstate on 2/15…Scored in double-digits 22 times…Grabbed a career-high 12 rebounds against Charleston Southern on 1/28…Hit the game-winning shot with under three seconds in a 21-point comeback over Presbyterian on 1/21…

2021-22 (Junior): Integral part of Big South championship team and first NCAA Tournament appearance in school history...Averaged 6.2 points and 16.5 minutes per game off the bench for the Lancers...Hit her season high of 14 points twice during the season...Tied her career high seven rebounds on February 20 against Hampton...Tied her career high five assists on January 23 against Winthrop...

2020-21 (Sophomore): Started and played in all 25 games while averaging 10.8 points, 2.9 rebounds and 27.5 minutes per game...Hit double figures 14 times in the scoring column…Hit multiple three’s in a game eight times…Scored a season-high 19 points against Gardner-Webb on February 19…Set a career high with seven rebounds on March 11 in the Big South Tournament Semifinals at Campbell…Tied a career high with four made threes against Charleston Southern on February 12…Tied a career high with a 9-10 performance at the free throw line on January 4 against USC Upstate…Set a career high with a 9-10 performance at the free throw line on December 19 against Howard…

2019-20 (Freshman): Named to All Big South Freshman team... One time Big South Freshman of the Week...Appeared in 30 games while starting 29 games in debut season for Longwood... Averaged 11.1 points per game including career-best 21-points against Charleston Southern on January 9... Scored double-digits 17 times, including two 20+ point performances against Wofford and Charleston Southern... Finished with a .336 percent three-point shooting percentage... One of three Lancers to average double-digits.

High School: A five-year letterwinner on the basketball court under the direction of Ashlen Dewart at Seneca, LeRoy was selected as one of the elite players throughout all divisions in South Carolina by the coaches in the state … Three-time Region I AAA Player of the Year and all-state selection … Totaled more than 2,000 career points during high school career … averaged 24.0 points, 5.0 assists, 4.9 steals and 5.0 rebounds per game as a senior ... Improved upon her scoring average every year at the high school level, averaging more than 10.0 points every season … Broke the Seneca High School scoring record in 2018-19 as a senior … An All-Region selection and four-year member of the women's golf team at Seneca while also earning varsity letters in soccer, cross country and track & field.

Personal: Daughter of Felicia and Al LeRoy… Has one sibling, Madelyn … Father Al played quarterback at Mars Hill … Plans to pursue a degree in kinesiology at Longwood.
